channel.title: CVE Feed for Themeum -- Tutor LMS

item.title: CVE-2024-37256|2024-07-09T09:02:44.548Z -- themeum -- tutor%20lms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Themeum Tutor LMS.This issue affects Tutor LMS: from n/a through 2.7.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-25799|2024-06-11T09:15:01.315Z -- themeum -- tutor%20lms
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Themeum Tutor LMS.This issue affects Tutor LMS: from n/a through 2.1.8.
